paper_title.en: Elimination of power line interference in ECG signal using inverse loop

description.en: Elimination of power line interference by electromagnetic induction in ECG signal has been described clearly by previous researchers. However, in this work we have proposed a new approach which electromagnetic induction effect depends on not only a conductive loop area but also body area and inverse loop area. By this method that interference can also be effectively eliminated to very small value.
